title: IGET Bar 3500 Puffs - Strawberry Watermelon
body_html:
IGET Bar 3500 Puffs - Strawberry Watermelon

Experience the irresistible combination of ripe strawberries and juicy watermelon with the IGET Bar 3500. This premium disposable vape delivers a refreshing, sweet blend that perfectly captures the essence of summer fruits in every puff. The smooth draw and consistent flavour make this one of the most popular choices among Australian vapers.

The IGET Bar 3500 features a sleek, pocket-friendly design with no buttons or complicated settings — simply inhale and enjoy. Pre-filled and pre-charged, it's ready to use straight out of the box, making it ideal for beginners and experienced vapers alike who want a hassle-free experience.

  • Battery: 1500mAh (non-rechargeable)
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 12ml

body_html:

The Lost Mary BM6000 Cherry Peach Lemonade is a sophisticated three-flavour blend that's both complex and refreshing. Tart, juicy cherries meet soft, sweet peaches, all rounded out by a bright, zesty lemonade base that ties everything together. It's a layered flavour profile that evolves with every puff, revealing new dimensions of taste each time.

As the flagship model in the Lost Mary range, the BM6000 is packed with premium features including a rechargeable USB-C battery, 14ml e-liquid capacity, and state-of-the-art mesh coil.
